name: ketone
description: Ketone monorepo - Web, API, and Sidecar

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "bun run dev:api" "bun run dev:web" "bun run dev:sidecar"
scripts.build:all: bun run build:api && bun run build:web && bun run build:sidecar
scripts.typecheck: bun run typecheck:api && bun run typecheck:web
